channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2023110162
item.description:
Report X-2023110162

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-23
  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The drum was discovered to be leaking when unloading from a trailer and brought to QA. DescribePack: There is a puncture hole near the bottom of the drum allowing contents to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The drum was placed in a salvage drum to contain the leak.

item.title: Report X-2023101317
item.description:
Report X-2023101317

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-17
  • City: STERLING HEIGHTS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was loaded to the vehicle, it was then noticed that there was a few drips coming from the bottom corner of the box. The package was removed from the vehicle, the drips were cleaned with a spill pad and the package was given to QA. DescribePack: there is a hairline crack in the body of the jug inside DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: the package was placed in a bag and spill pad lined tote and taken to QA

Report X-2023101315

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: pail was dented due to handling, upon sending it up the induct a leaking was found, absorbent pads were used and pail was put into a drum to prevent more leakage DescribePack: seal broke due to dent DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: absorbent pads
